EngageManifest.Title: Three Column
EngageManifest.Description:
Displays the slide in three columns; content image, content, and pager title list.

The content image and the content itself take up 70% of the total content pane width, while the pager list takes up the remaining 30%.

The content image is 39% of the 70% of total content pane width. The content is 59% of the 70% of total content pane width.

The pager title list takes up the remaining 30% of the total content pane width, and displays as a vertical list with a dashed line border separating each slide title.

The selected slide title will have a slight gray background color to indicate which slide is being displayed.
